LanguageData.USAC_Bullet_FullPowerRifle.label: full power rifle bullet
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_AssaultRifle.label: advanced auto rifle
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_AssaultRifle.description: An advanced precision rifle that strikes a good balance between accuracy, power and weight. Its full-power ammunition can effectively penetrate conventional bulletproof plates and cause effective damage, but its firing interval is relatively slow.
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_AssaultRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_AssaultRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_LightMachinegun.label: Advanced LMG
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_LightMachinegun.description: A precision rifle that has been modified to provide sustained firepower through an air-cooled barrel and belt-fed ammunition. Its full-power rounds can effectively penetrate conventional ballistic protection, but it is bulky and requires squad cover.
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_MarksmanRifle.label: advanced marksman rifle
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_MarksmanRifle.description: A modified precision rifle designed for long-range burst fire, using full-power ammunition that can effectively penetrate conventional ballistic protection at long range, making it an ideal marksman rifle.
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_MarksmanRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
